text: is one of the 23 special wards of Tokyo, Japan.Tokyo Metropolitan Government (TMG), "Municipalities within Tokyo" . Retrieved 2012-4-2. The municipality calls itself "Minato City" in English.Minato City . Retrieved 2012-4-2. ==History== On 15 March 1947, the ward of Minato was formed by combining the wards of Akasaka, Azabu, and Shiba. ==Geography== Minato is on Toyko Bay. It borders Shinagawa on the south. Meguro is southwest of the ward. Shibuya is on the ward's western border. Shinjuku, Chiyoda and Chūō are on the northern border. ==Related pages == * List of special wards of Tokyo * Capital of Japan ==References== ==Other websites== * Minato website * Tokyo Metropolitan Government, Special wards Category:Wards of Tokyo Category:Settlements in Tokyo Prefecture Category:1947 establishments in Japan
title: Minato, Tokyo
